title: My LoL isn't working correctly

replies.body:
If only they would tell you that this might happen when that option is selected, and only if you could changing display settings out of game.

If you still want the behaviour of having other windows on top of League, you can always try borderless mode.
let me see if it works thx for the tip.
start a custom game and once inside a match press escape, then go to video settings and change the window mode back to fullscreen
